alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 30 at 8:39PM CDT until April 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting La Crosse and Trempealeau zones. ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is likely. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 40.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage is expected to be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
